He is currently a System Support II at Robert Half (contracting for a banking client) and a Founding Software Engineer at Seaside Talent. His background is primarily in IT support, systems analysis (Global Partners LP, Wayfair), and more recently, full-stack web development (Next.js, Supabase). While he has experience with APIs and data migration (Salesforce), there is no evidence of specialized mobile development (iOS/Android) or third-party mobile SDK integration experience.

relevance.reasoning: The candidate is an IT professional and web software engineer, not a mobile developer; he lacks the specific experience with mobile app integrations and mobile SDKs required by the query.

accuracy.reasoning: All key facts including his current roles at Robert Half and Seaside Talent, his education at WGU, and his location in Boston were verified through his LinkedIn profile and search results.

information_completeness.reasoning: The profile is very detailed, providing a full career history, specific tech stacks for recent roles, education dates, and a comprehensive bio.

uniqueness.reasoning: As a 'Founding Software Engineer' at a small startup (Seaside Talent) and a contractor, he is a non-obvious result compared to high-profile engineers at major Boston tech firms.

droid.name: Nat Wales
droid.verification: Nat Wales is a verified Senior React Native Engineer based in Boston, MA. His personal website (natwales.com) and resume confirm his role at Fireside (a platform co-founded by Mark Cuban) and his previous long-term tenure at Hill Holliday. His experience includes high-stakes integrations such as Salesforce for Party City, iBeacons and Mapbox for the Boston Public Garden app, and computer vision for Bank of America.
